title: Diamonds
author: Rihanna
lyrics:
[00:00.90] Shine bright like a diamond
[00:05.90] Shine bright like a diamond
[00:11.26] Find light in the beautiful sea, I choose to be happy
[00:16.23] You and I, you and I, we're like diamonds in the sky
[00:21.86] You're a shooting star I see, a vision of ecstasy
[00:26.42] When you hold me, I'm alive, we're like diamonds in the sky
[00:32.05] I knew that we'd become one right away
[00:38.75] Oh, right away
[00:42.18] At first sight I felt the energy of sun rays
[00:49.27] I saw the life inside your eyes
[00:51.16] So shine bright, tonight, you and I
[00:59.57] We're beautiful like diamonds in the sky

[01:45.25] You're a shooting star I see, a vision of ecstasy
[01:49.73] When you hold me, I'm alive, we're like diamonds in the sky
